add_library(para_libssl INTERFACE)
add_library(para_libcrypto INTERFACE)

if(ANDROID)
    target_include_directories(para_libssl INTERFACE include/android)
    target_link_libraries(para_libssl INTERFACE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/prebuilt/android/${CMAKE_ANDROID_ARCH_ABI}/libssl.a)
    target_include_directories(para_libcrypto INTERFACE include/android)
    target_link_libraries(para_libcrypto INTERFACE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/prebuilt/android/${CMAKE_ANDROID_ARCH_ABI}/libcrypto.a)
elseif(IOS)
    target_include_directories(para_libssl INTERFACE include/ios)
    target_link_libraries(para_libssl INTERFACE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/prebuilt/ios/libssl.a)
    target_include_directories(para_libcrypto INTERFACE include/ios)
    target_link_libraries(para_libcrypto INTERFACE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/prebuilt/ios/libcrypto.a)
elseif(WIN32)
    target_include_directories(para_libssl INTERFACE include/win32)
    target_link_libraries(para_libssl INTERFACE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/prebuilt/win32/libssl.lib)
    target_include_directories(para_libcrypto INTERFACE include/win32)
    target_link_libraries(para_libcrypto INTERFACE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/prebuilt/win32/libcrypto.lib)
endif()
